title: Richard Armitage, Bel Powley, Henry Rowley Narrate Audiobook for Alice Feeney’s ‘My Husband’s Wife’ (Exclusive First Listen)
summary: The thriller author's new book comes amid the anticipated Netflix series adaptation of her novel ‘His & Hers’ starring Tessa Thompson.

title: Sean Hayes to Star in Off-Broadway Thriller ‘The Unknown’
summary: The play is slated for a 10-week run at Studio Seaview starting Jan. 31, 2026.

title: Japan to dispatch senior envoy to China, NHK says, as travel warning drives tourism selloff in Tokyo
summary: Japan's tourism-related stocks fell amid worsening diplomatic standoff between the two nations after Beijing issued a travel and study advisory.
